main event: Witnesses reported seeing a bright light shaped like a drop of water in the sky on August 14, 1963.
interesting points: The light changed direction several times and varied in altitude during the observation., The object appeared as bright as the brightest star with a white color and reddish edge., It was observed for about 8 minutes before disappearing., Witnesses noted a halo around the light and described it as not being a dazzling light., At no point did the witnesses see any characteristics indicating it was an aircraft.
sighted object: a bright light shaped like a drop of water
